For students and instructors

Support your ideas with research from our online library of scholarly journal, magazine and newspaper articles.

Discover credible, citable articles from academic journals, education journals, and math and engineering journals. HighBeam Research has hundreds of peer-reviewed medical journals, law journals and psychology journals.

Popular academic publications include:
  • Social Forces
  • World Literature Today
  • The Historian
  • JOPERD
  • Harvard Law Review
  • Teaching Exceptional Children

View our complete list of over 6,500 publications by category.

For professionals

Become an expert in the field with research from our comprehensive online collection of articles from reputable trade magazines and journals.

Explore articles from business journals and trade journals, or review information from magazines that cover business, management, IT, medical and other fields. HighBeam Research has your industry covered.

Popular publications for professionals include:
  • Newsweek
  • Crain's New York Business
  • Advertising Age
  • Journal of Counseling and Development
  • AORN Journal
  • The Yale Law Journal

View our complete list of over 6,500 publications by category.

For everyone

Get the backstory with articles and research on events surrounding politics, history and culture – past and present.

Dive into the deep archive of U.S. newspapers and U.K. newspapers, transcripts and history journals, or browse articles from political magazines, cultural magazines, and hobby and entertainment magazines. HighBeam Research provides the full story on important issues with over 20 years of published research.

Popular publications for information enthusiasts include:
  • The Boston Globe
  • The Washington Post
  • Daily Mail (London)
  • NPR All Things Considered
  • The Economist
  • Christian Science Monitor

View our complete list of over 6,500 publications by category.

Powerful research tools

Time-saving tools for finding, saving, organizing and sharing information.

  • Export articles

    Export articles

    Subscriber tool

    Export individual full-text articles to Microsoft Word in one simple click. Or select multiple articles and export them as a single document.

  • Email articles & topics

    Email articles & topics

    Subscribers get full-text articles!

    Subscribers can easily share topics and full-text articles with friends, family or colleagues. Non-subscribers can share previews of articles.

  • Save and organize your research

    Save and organize your research

    Subscriber tool

    Move, copy, delete, and save articles and searches in your own custom Research Center. Easily retrieve, print or export saved articles. Re-launch saved searches with a single click.

  • Set up email alerts

    Set up email alerts

    Subscriber tool

    Create email alerts based on topics, keywords, publications or publication types. Matching articles will be delivered to your inbox daily or weekly – you decide.
